title: Commute route
name: Commute route
description:
A Map by Flyingcursor

Landmarks in my bicycle commute to work.

properties.name: Another nice stretch.
properties.description: Posted by Flyingcursor Alcott and BurdickMuch less traffic on the inbound drive. Slightly downhill so you can go clear to Lake St at 20-25mph if you want.

properties.name: Back on the trail.
properties.description: Posted by Flyingcursor Back on the trail.This slows things down because the trail meanders. It is a nice ride though. Watch out for deer and other critters!!!!

properties.name: Final Stop
properties.description: Posted by Flyingcursor Portage Rd.Here\'s where I park the bike. A nice enclosed, safe place. I still use two locks.

properties.name: Final stretch.
properties.description: Posted by Flyingcursor S. Burdick and Lake St. I take Lake to John, Crosstown to Jasper and up.

properties.name: Get off Portage road going west
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorDaanes Party StoreA good spot to get off Portage since the shoulder disappears here. It takes about 12 minutes to get here from the start.

properties.name: Great hill.
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorBurdick hill.This is a nice downward sloping hill to Cork St. where you can really get up some speed. The return trip is another story.

properties.name: Optional turn off
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorGarden and Lover\'s Lane.If you want to take the scenic route or head west you can turn here. The trail down Garden goes to the Celery Flats trail and west across Westnedge. I continue north when going to work.

properties.name: Payback
properties.description: Posted by Flyingcursor Burdick and CorkNow it\'s a short but bothersome climb almost to the curve. Not too bad if you spin well.

properties.name: Stage 4.
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorLover\'s and Milham.Head West on Milham to the Celery Flats trail. Once they get done with construction on Lover\'s Lane just north of here the turn won\'t be necessary.

properties.name: Stage 5
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorStage 5The trail ends. Now it\'s back on the road and in Kalamazoo. Head west to S. Burdick.

properties.name: Starting point
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorStarting pointWhere I start out after messing around with my stuff for too long.

properties.name: Sucky intersection.
properties.description: Posted by Flyingcursor Walnut and Jaspter.With the hospital right there this should be a 4 way stop. It takes a while to get across.

properties.name: Third Stage
properties.description: Posted by FlyingcursorCentre and Lover\'s LaneTHe Portage bike trail starts here. It\'s smooth, wide and a nice ride in the morning. Keep heading north.
